github.copilot.chat.codeGeneration.instr.text:
This is the @bacons/xcode repository (EvanBacon/xcode on GitHub). It's a TypeScript library for parsing and manipulating Xcode project files (.pbxproj). Key information:

- Repository: EvanBacon/xcode
- Package: @bacons/xcode
- Purpose: pbxproj parser and Xcode project manipulation
- Main technologies: TypeScript, Chevrotain parser, Jest testing
- Key features: Model-based API for Xcode projects, Swift Package Manager support, FileSystemSynchronized objects
